name: seedy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
looking dirty or in bad condition and likely to be involved in dishonest or illegal activities: a seedy hotel He didn't like the look of the seedy characters who were hanging around outside the bar. Synonyms
scruffy
sleazy
squalid (DIRTY) disapproving

in bad condition, esp. because not cared for and therefore unattractive: We had quarters in a rather seedy hotel near the railroad tracks.
